https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7pXH10KwzFOnSbDdcUg2s6ohslV.jpg Unable to get over the tragic loss of the love of his life, and stuck with a day job of editing adult videos, Chase meets an unlikely ally - a call girl (Valentine) who works under the various personas she has created for herself. Is Chase ready to uncover Valentine's dark secrets? Chasing Valentine
